name: Gift Shop
villain: lets out a continuous cry. You are quickly surrounded by other balloon animals and they grab you. You start to float away to never to be seen again. Game Over.
Quickly you prick the Balloon dog with a needle, and it drops a key. You pick it up.

name: Cotton Candy Stand
villain: The Cotton Candy Monster did not like that. The Monster grabs you spins you in the cotton candy machine. You are now a Cotton Candy Monster. Game Over.
The Cotton Candy Monster shrivels up and deteriorates into a pink goo. Within the goo there is a key. You pick it up.

name: Popcorn Stand
villain: The Popcorn Snake is not fazed by your actions. It completely wraps around you, and drags you into the popcorn machine. You are now a popcorn snake. Game Over.
You grab the broom and sweep up Popcorn Snake into the trash. It leaves behind a key. You pick it up.
unReachableDirection: a pile of kernels paper bags
